text: New Vernon is an unincorporated community and census-designated place. within Harding Township in Morris County, New Jersey, United States.Locality Search, State of New Jersey. Accessed June 8, 2016. As of the 2020 United States Census, the population was 825. Forbes magazine ranked New Vernon, New Jersey as one of the 25 most "expensive" zip codes in the country.The Most Expensive ZIP Codes 2006 , Forbes magazine April 21, 2006 ==References== Category:Census-designated places in New Jersey Category:Unincorporated communities in New Jersey
title: New Vernon, New Jersey
